title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Short-Intensive Course on Flipped Learning-Based Scientific Research Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of scientific research methodologies and proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze scientific research questions and develop research designs in a flipped learning environment
Learners can explain core concepts of research methodology with over 80% accuracy based on pre-learning materials
Learners can revise draft research proposals and identify improvements through peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
